response.overview: Barney the Dinosaur joins his friends on an imaginative trip to school, where they explore classrooms, learn about safety, play games, and discover the fun of learning together. With songs, storytelling, and gentle lessons, Barney Goes to School encourages preschool-aged viewers to feel confident and excited about starting school.
response.tagline: Join Barney and friends on a fun-filled first day of school
response.title: Barney Goes to School
